title: Microstuttering in 7.3
body:
Hello all,

I'm currently having issues with an annoying level of stuttering while playing the game. This problem shows up more often when minions are around, and only when I have my game window settings to Full screen and Border less. The issue does not exist when on Windowed mode. I've noticed this problem for about two days now. It's like a micro stutter that just has everything lagging in frames a slight bit. I've never encountered an issue like this in the three years I've been playing.

I've tried a few different ways to fix this that I thought might work. Unfortunately, nothing seems to solve the issue. I've tried: locking and unlocking frames, smooth camera option, tinkering with pretty much every graphical setting, reinstalling the game, and updating my video card drivers. I didn't change anything about my settings to cause the issue a few days ago, as the game has always run flawlessly for me on very high settings capped at 60FPS.

Has anyone noticed this issue recently? Or have a potential solution to this problem? I've done some searching online and on forums, but have not come up with any relevant and recent posts about this issue. (Maybe my search skills are shit)?

My PC is relatively decent specs wise (i7 6700k, GTX 970, 16GB RAM), so it shouldn't come down to weak hardware issues. (I have tested other games today like GTA 5 on nearly maxed out settings and it runs without a hitch). This leads me to believe it's not likely a hardware issue, but could be something software related, or some random setting that could be the issue.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated! Thanks

TL;DR: Microstuttering/FPS lag on Fullscreen and Borderless mode. Issue showed up 2 days ago after patch 7.3. Looking for a solution.

replies.body:
It does sounds like you're having some fps issues; though, it's strange to only be limited to full screen.  I was actually going to ask about capping your frames but it looks like you've already gone through a solid list of steps.  

If you haven't make sure to go through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as well to make sure every possibility is ruled out, and that all of your drivers are up to date.  Let me know how that guide works out for you.  The steps includes steps in case your game files might have become corrupt too, since the issue seems to be exclusive to League.  I hope that helps!
I'm having a similar issue, and I've been hearing about others also getting the same issue only for league recently. It all started right after 7.3.
Glad to hear it's not just me with the issue! I finally decided today that I was going to look into it, or start looking for help.
Did anyone fix the problem?It started in 7.9 for me.

Hello,

Thanks for your reply! 

I followed the step on the FPS issues guide. Did registry cleanups, repaired LoL client and everything to possibly fix corrupt files. Unfortunately, nothing seems to solve the issue. I even put the game onto lowest possible settings, shadows off, and tried everything that way too.. Still having the problem. The in game FPS counter shows that 60FPS is constant even while the stuttering is present, so there must be something else going on.  

As mentioned before, the only apparent fix I've found so far is to play in Windowed mode. Unfortunately, there is a white band on the top that shifts the HUD and UI downwards, and is quite annoying.

I have always played this game with "very high" maxed out settings, and locked at 60FPS, since there is no need for 250+ frames. It's been smooth and problem free for three years. It's just the last few days since 7.3 that this has been an issue. 

Hopefully this helps explain some more of the issue at hand!

Thanks for this detailed info, though it sucks the issue hasn't been resolved.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will work with you individually on this.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to automatically obtain some logs to attach to it for more context.   We'll get back to you!
I fixed this issue by turning off g-sync.

I have had this exact same issue, op. Micro-stuttering in game but things like Plays.TV were stuttering in a big way post 7.3. I play at 144hz gsync on with vertical sync turned on in-game. I have a 6700k, gtx 1070, 32gb RAM, 512gb NVME ssd set up with a 144hz 1440p gsync monitor (asus pg279q). I turned off g-sync and that solved it, but why would it work pre-7.2?

Unrelated note: I'm considering just leaving gsync off for league, turning up my monitor refresh rate to 165hz (my monitor's max setting) and capping frame rate at 144hz in game settings... would this give me good results?

I am having exact the same problem. I repaired 3 times, ran down the list for solving fps problems. Yesterday i deleted lol and reinstalled. Nothing worked exept playing in windowed mode. But my performance is terrible cuz i click alot of times out of my game. I hope you guys find a solution quikly. Glad i found people with same problems cuz none of my friends has.
